scripts.build: next build && bun run copy-content && bun run generate-rss
scripts.normalize-extensions: find out/images -type f -name '*.JPG' -exec bash -c 'echo Converting \"$1\" to lowercase; mv "$1" "${1%.JPG}.jpg"' _ {} \; && echo 'Done normalizing extensions'
scripts.predeploy: bun run build && bun run normalize-extensions && bun run normalize-markdown
scripts.copy-content: cp -r public/content out/ && cp -r public/images out/ && cp public/CNAME out/ && cp public/404.html out/ && cp public/sitemap.xml out/ && cp public/robots.txt out/ && cp public/files out/ -r && cp public/.nojekyll out/
